EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're receiving this newsletter because of your relationship with TriTech Software Systems.
POSTED 12.23.11
GA11-027 Microsoft Critical Security Bulletin – December 2011
Dear Clients,
The Technical Advisory - GA11-027 - Microsoft Critical Security Bulletin - December 2011 has been posted to the MyVisiNet support site. Microsoft has released three (3) Critical Security Updates for the month of December, 2011. The vulnerabilities discussed in this bulletin involve Microsoft Windows and other Microsoft products.
You may access this advisory via the Myvisinet Support site under Documentation | Tech Advisories | Microsoft Advisories | 2011.
Sincerely,
Tony Vardiman Technical Services Frontline Supervisor | VisiNet Solutions TriTech Software Systems | tritech.com Direct: 858.799.7441 | Mobile: 619.816.7100 Fax: 858.799.7010 | Support: 800.847.4223 Support Website: myvisinet.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego | CA | 92121
